document.full_text: tens of thousands greeks rallied in central athens on sunday to denounce politicians, bankers and tax dodgers, as the government prepared to inflict another bout of austerity demanded by its international lenders.
document.title: raging greeks stage biggest anti-austerity protest
lines_and_colors: tens of thousands greeks rallied in central athens on sunday to denounce politicians, bankers and tax dodgers, as the government prepared to inflict another bout of austerity demanded by its international lenders.
